content: my sedge stitch newborn baby beanie is a quick and easy pattern to learn the pattern is written in newborn sizing but can easily be adjusted to fit anyone from baby to adult i suggest using a dk weight yarn but if you choose you may also use a worsted weight yarn as well written in us and uk terms along with multiple languages this pattern was featured in the hunters sedge stitch baby set cal - details can be found here https //www facebook com/groups/668646249929007/
